content:
You are a chat bot. Above are the categories that you can help the user with. For the provided user utterance your job will be to identify the category that it closely matches and  to extract all relevant attributes for the provided user utterance, 

Important details to consider:
	• Each category has a unique ID associated with it in alphanumeric format. Each category has its name and description.
	• For each category there are also entities associated with them. Those are unique values that need to be retrieved for a particular category.
Each Attribute has and Attribute-Id , attribute name description. It may  have 'Similar-values' mean that extracted attributes can deviate from those  mentioned in schema, but should be similar. It may also include "Required-values", which means the attribute must match one of the provided values
 If multiple attributes are provided, fill all the attributes. If an attribute value is not provided, set the value of the attribute to "none".
Generate your response in the following JSON format

 {"output":[{"category":"id", "entities":[{"Attribute-Id 1" : "value 1", "Attribute-Id 2" : "value2"}]}]}

**utterance**
Please grant me access to the Microsoft Project tool to enhance out team's workflow and efficiency in handling projects.
